targets.query:
select
  time,
  ((c - c_lag) + (r - r_lag)) / extract(epoch from time - time_lag) as tps
from (
        select 
          (data->>'xact_commit')::int8 as c, lag((data->>'xact_commit')::int8) over w as c_lag,
          (data->>'xact_rollback')::int8 as r, lag((data->>'xact_rollback')::int8) over w as r_lag,
          time, lag(time) over w as time_lag
        from metrics 
        where dbname = '$dbname' and metric = 'db_stats' and time > now() - '30m'::interval
        window w as (order by time)        
) x 
where c >= c_lag and r >= r_lag
order by time
;
targets.rawSql:
select
  $__timeGroup(time, $__interval),
  avg(((c - c_lag) + (r - r_lag)) / extract(epoch from time - time_lag)) as tps
from (
        select 
          (data->>'xact_commit')::int8 as c, lag((data->>'xact_commit')::int8) over w as c_lag,
          (data->>'xact_rollback')::int8 as r, lag((data->>'xact_rollback')::int8) over w as r_lag,
          time, lag(time) over w as time_lag
        from metrics
        where dbname = '$dbname' and metric = 'db_stats' and $__timeFilter(time)
        window w as (order by time)        
) x
where c >= c_lag and r >= r_lag
group by 1
order by 1

panels.description: Queries Per Second based on pg_stat_statements.calls

targets.query: SELECT non_negative_derivative(last("calls"), 1s) FROM "stat_statements_calls" WHERE $timeFilter AND "dbname" =~ /^$dbname$/ GROUP BY time(5m) fill(none)
targets.rawSql:
select
  $__timeGroup(time, $__interval),
  avg((c - c_lag) / extract(epoch from time - time_lag)) as qps
from (
        select 
          (data->>'calls')::int8 as c, lag((data->>'calls')::int8) over w as c_lag,
          time, lag(time) over w as time_lag
        from metrics
        where dbname = '$dbname' and metric = 'stat_statements_calls' and $__timeFilter(time)
        window w as (order by time)        
) x
where c >= c_lag
group by 1
order by 1

panels.title: QPS

panels.description: Requries pg_stat_statements extension and the "get_stat_statements" helper function  from  the "sql/metric_fetching_helpers" folder on the monitored DB

targets.query: --select mean(q) from (SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean("total_time")) / non_negative_derivative(mean("calls")) as q FROM "stat_statements" WHERE "dbname" =~ /^$dbname$/ AND "query" !~ /(?i)::int8[\s+]as[\s]+epoch_ns/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY queryid, time(5m) fill(none)) group by time(5m) fill(none)
targets.rawSql:
select
  time,
  avg(avg) as "avg_query_runtime"
from (

select
$__timeGroup(time, $__interval),
queryid,
avg((tt-tt_lag)::numeric / (c-c_lag))

from (

        select 
          (data->>'total_time')::float8 as tt, lag((data->>'total_time')::float8) over w as tt_lag,
          (data->>'calls')::int8 as c, lag((data->>'calls')::int8) over w as c_lag,
          tag_data->>'queryid' as queryid,
          time
        from metrics
        where dbname = '$dbname' and metric = 'stat_statements' and $__timeFilter(time)
        and tag_data ? 'queryid'
        window w as (partition by tag_data->>'queryid' order by time)
) x
where c > c_lag and tt >= tt_lag
group by 1, 2
order by 1, 2
) y
group by 1
order by 1

panels.title: Query runtime

targets.rawSql:
select
  time,
  max(last_value-first_value) as size_diff
from (
  select
    date_trunc('hour', time) as time,
    first_value((data->>'size_b')::int8) over w,
    last_value((data->>'size_b')::int8) over w
  from
    metrics
  where 
    dbname = '$dbname' and metric = 'db_stats' and $__timeFilter(time)
  window w as (
     partition by date_trunc('hour', time) order by time rows BETWEEN UNBOUNDED PRECEDING AND UNBOUNDED FOLLOWING
  )
) x
group by 1
order by 1;

targets.query: SELECT mean("approx_free_space_b") FROM "table_bloat_approx_summary" WHERE ("dbname" =~ /^$dbname$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1h) fill(none)
targets.rawSql:
-- SELECT mean("approx_free_space_b") FROM "table_bloat_approx_summary" WHERE ("dbname" =~ /^$dbname$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1h) fill(none)
SELECT
  date_trunc('hour', time) as time,
  avg((data->>'approx_free_space_b')::int8)
FROM
  metrics
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(time)
  AND dbname = '$dbname' and metric = 'table_bloat_approx_summary'
GROUP BY
  1
ORDER BY
  1

panels.description: Last CPU load_5 value. NB! Requires get_load_average() function making use of PL/Pythonu

targets.query: SELECT mean("load_5min") FROM "cpu_load" WHERE ("dbname" =~ /^$dbname$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(none)
targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  $__timeGroup(time, $__interval),
  avg((data->>'load_5min')::numeric)
FROM
  metrics
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(time)
  AND dbname = '$dbname' and metric = 'cpu_load'
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY 1

panels.title: CPU Load

targets.query: SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean("tup_deleted"), 1h) FROM "db_stats" WHERE "dbname" =~ /^$dbname$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(none)
targets.rawSql:
select
  $__timeGroup(time, $__interval),
  avg((ins-ins_lag) * 3600 / extract(epoch from time - time_lag)) as "INSERT",
  avg((upd-upd_lag) * 3600 / extract(epoch from time - time_lag)) as "UPDATE",
  avg((del-del_lag) * 3600 / extract(epoch from time - time_lag)) as "DELETE"
from (
        select 
          (data->>'tup_inserted')::int8 as ins, lag((data->>'tup_inserted')::int8) over w as ins_lag,
          (data->>'tup_updated')::int8 as upd, lag((data->>'tup_updated')::int8) over w as upd_lag,
          (data->>'tup_deleted')::int8 as del, lag((data->>'tup_deleted')::int8) over w as del_lag,
          time, lag(time) over w as time_lag
        from metrics
        where dbname = '$dbname' and metric = 'db_stats' and $__timeFilter(time)
        window w as (order by time)
) x
where ins >= ins_lag and upd >= upd_lag and del >= del_lag
group by 1
order by 1

panels.title: Tuple  ins. / upd. / del. statistics (1h rates)

targets.query: SELECT ( non_negative_derivative(mean("blks_hit")) / (non_negative_derivative(mean("blks_hit")) + non_negative_derivative(mean("blks_read")))) * 100 FROM "db_stats" WHERE "dbname" =~ /^$dbname$/ AND  $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(none)
targets.rawSql:
select
  $__timeGroup(time, $__interval),
  avg((hit-hit_lag)::numeric / ((hit-hit_lag) + (read-read_lag)))*100 as "Shared buffers hit ratio",
  avg((roll-roll_lag)::numeric / ((roll-roll_lag) + (comm-comm_lag)))*100 as "TX rollback ratio"
from (
        select 
          (data->>'blks_hit')::int8 as hit, lag((data->>'blks_hit')::int8) over w as hit_lag,
          (data->>'blks_read')::int8 as read, lag((data->>'blks_read')::int8) over w as read_lag,
          (data->>'xact_rollback')::int8 as roll, lag((data->>'xact_rollback')::int8) over w as roll_lag,
          (data->>'xact_commit')::int8 as comm, lag((data->>'xact_commit')::int8) over w as comm_lag,
          time
        from metrics
        where dbname = '$dbname' and metric = 'db_stats' and $__timeFilter(time)
        window w as (order by time)
) x
where hit >= hit_lag and read >= read_lag and ((hit-hit_lag) + (read-read_lag) > 0)
group by 1
order by 1

panels.title: Shared Buffers hit ratio + Rollback ratio

targets.query: SELECT mean("numbackends") FROM "db_stats" WHERE "dbname" =~ /^$dbname$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(none)
targets.rawSql:
select
  $__timeGroup(time, $__interval),
  avg(nb) as "# Sessions",
  avg(case when dl-dl_lag > 0 then (dl-dl_lag) / (etime - lag_etime) else 0 end) as "Deadlocks (1h rate)"
from (
        select 
          (data->>'numbackends')::int8 as nb,
          (data->>'deadlocks')::int8 as dl, lag((data->>'deadlocks')::int8) over w as dl_lag,
          (extract(epoch from time))::int8 as etime,
          (lag(extract(epoch from time)) over w)::int8 as lag_etime,
          time
        from metrics
        where dbname = '$dbname' and metric = 'db_stats' and $__timeFilter(time)
        window w as (order by time)
) x
where dl >= dl_lag
group by 1
order by 1

select
  $__timeGroup(time, $__interval),
  avg(case when tb-tb_lag > 0 then (tb-tb_lag) / (etime - lag_etime) else 0 end) as "Temp bytes (1h rate)"
from (
        select 
          (data->>'temp_bytes')::int8 as tb, lag((data->>'temp_bytes')::int8) over w as tb_lag,
          (extract(epoch from time))::int8 as etime,
          (lag(extract(epoch from time)) over w)::int8 as lag_etime,
          time
        from metrics
        where dbname = '$dbname' and metric = 'db_stats' and $__timeFilter(time)
        window w as (order by time)
) x
where tb >= tb_lag
group by 1
order by 1

targets.query: SELECT derivative(mean("xlog_location_b"), 1s) FROM "wal" WHERE "dbname" =~ /^$dbname$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(none)
targets.rawSql:
select
  $__timeGroup(time, $__interval),
  avg((wal-wal_lag) / (etime-lag_etime)) as "WAL rate"
from (
        select 
          (data->>'xlog_location_b')::int8 as wal, lag((data->>'xlog_location_b')::int8) over w as wal_lag,
          extract(epoch from time) as etime,
          lag(extract(epoch from time)) over w as lag_etime,
          time
        from metrics
        where dbname = '$dbname' and metric = 'wal' and $__timeFilter(time)
        window w as (order by time)
) x
where wal >= wal_lag and etime - lag_etime > 0
group by 1
order by 1

select
  $__timeGroup(time, $__interval),
  avg(size_b) as "DB Size"
from (
        select 
          (data->>'size_b')::int8 as size_b,
          time
        from metrics
        where dbname = '$dbname' and metric = 'db_stats' and $__timeFilter(time)
) x
group by 1
order by 1

targets.query: SELECT mean("idle") FROM "backends" WHERE "dbname" =~ /^$dbname$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(none)
targets.rawSql:
select
  $__timeGroup(time, $__interval),
  avg((data->>'idle')::int8) as idle,
  avg((data->>'idleintransaction')::int8) as "idle in transaction",
  avg((data->>'waiting')::int8) as waiting,
  avg((data->>'active')::int8) as active  
from metrics
  where dbname = '$dbname' and metric = 'backends'and $__timeFilter(time)
group by 1
order by 1

panels.description: Requires according "metric fetching helpers" on the monitored server

targets.query: SELECT mean("load_5min") FROM "cpu_load" WHERE "dbname" =~ /^$dbname$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(none)
targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  $__timeGroup(time, $__interval),
  avg((data->>'load_5min')::numeric) as "load_5"
FROM
  metrics
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(time)
  AND dbname = '$dbname' and metric = 'cpu_load'
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY 1

targets.query: select mean(runtime) from (SELECT non_negative_derivative(last("total_time"), 1h) / non_negative_derivative(last("calls"), 1h) as runtime FROM "stat_statements" WHERE "dbname" =~ /^$dbname$/ AND "query" !~ /(?i)::int8[\s]+as[\s]+epoch_ns/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY queryid, time($__interval) fill(none)) group by time($__interval) fill(none)
targets.rawSql:
select
  time,
  avg(avg) as "avg_query_runtime"
from (

select
$__timeGroup(time, $__interval),
queryid,
avg((tt-tt_lag)::numeric / (c-c_lag))

from (

        select 
          (data->>'total_time')::float8 as tt, lag((data->>'total_time')::float8) over w as tt_lag,
          (data->>'calls')::int8 as c, lag((data->>'calls')::int8) over w as c_lag,
          tag_data->>'queryid' as queryid,
          time
        from metrics
        where dbname = '$dbname' and metric = 'stat_statements' and $__timeFilter(time)
        and tag_data ? 'queryid'
        window w as (partition by tag_data->>'queryid' order by time)
) x
where c > c_lag and tt >= tt_lag
group by 1, 2
order by 1, 2
) y
group by 1
order by 1

panels.title: CPU load + avg. query runtime
